sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-amar.title: 2015 NFL Draft: Amari Cooper scouting report -...
sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-amar.snippet: If you're looking for a polished wide receiver to step in and be a productive starter from day 1, Amari Cooper's your guy. Let's take a look at how his game will translate to the NFL.

sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-jame.title: 2015 NFL Draft: Jameis Winston scouting report -...
sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-jame.snippet: With a Heisman Trophy and a National Championship under his belt, Jameis Winston is widely expected to be the first overall pick in the 2015 NFL Draft. Dan Rubenstein breaks down why he's such a tantalizing prospect.

sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-kevi.title: 2015 NFL Draft: Kevin White scouting report -...
sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-kevi.snippet: Kevin White burst on to the scene in 2014 with a huge season that catapulted him from relative unknown to possibly the top receiver prospect in the upcoming draft. Let's take a look at his rise to stardom.

sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-leon.title: 2015 NFL Draft: Leonard Williams scouting report -...
sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-leon.snippet: Leonard Williams is widely expected to be the first non-quarterback selected in the NFL draft. Dan Rubenstein explains why he'll be wreaking havoc on offenses for the next decade.

sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-marc.title: 2015 NFL Draft: Marcus Mariota scouting report -...
sbnation.com/2015/04/2015-nfl-draft-marc.snippet: After a decorated college career capped with a Heisman Trophy in 2014, Marcus Mariota won't have to wait too long to hear his name called on April 30th - so let's take a look at how his game will project to the NFL.
